packets.name: Account Login Rejected
packets.description: Sent when account login fails. Contains the reason for rejection.

packets.name: Account Login Ack (Server List)
packets.description: Sent after successful account login. Contains the list of available game servers.

packets.name: Play Server Ack
packets.description: Sent after selecting a server. Contains connection details for the game server.

related.note: Client sends game login with this authId

packets.name: Character List
packets.description: Sent after game login. Contains the list of characters on the account and starting city information. Extended format in 7.0.13.0+ includes city coordinates.

fields.name: Cities
fields.description: Starting city entries (89 bytes each, extended format)

fields.name: City Name
fields.description: City name (1 byte longer than classic)

fields.name: Building Name
fields.description: Building/tavern name (1 byte longer than classic)

fields.name: Flags
fields.description: Character list flags (same as classic format)

fields.name: Last Char Slot
fields.description: Last played character slot index (-1 if none)

packets.name: Login Confirmation
packets.description: Sent when entering the world. Confirms the player's mobile serial and initial position.

packets.name: Login Complete
packets.description: Final packet in the login sequence. Signals that the client can begin normal gameplay.

packets.name: Client Version Request
packets.description: Request for the client to send its version string.
packets.notes: Same packet ID (0xBD) is used for both request (server) and response (client).

packets.name: Supported Features
packets.description: Informs the client which features are enabled on the server. Feature flags control T2A, LBR, AOS, SE, ML, SA, HS features and character slot limits.

fields.name: Features
fields.description: 32-bit feature flags bitmask (includes all 16-bit flags plus expansion flags)

clientVersion.notes: ExtendedSupportedFeatures determines which variant is sent

packets.name: Character Delete Result
packets.description: Result of a character deletion request.

packets.name: Popup Message
packets.description: Displays a predefined popup message to the client.

packets.name: Change Character
packets.description: Updates the character list during reconnection. Currently unused.

packets.name: Character List Update
packets.description: Updates the character list after character creation or deletion.
